text: The flag of Namibia was adopted on 21 March 1990 upon independence from South Africa. It was designed by Frederick Brownell. == Appearance == It has a white-edged red diagonal band radiating from the lower hoist-side corner. The upper triangle is blue, charged with a gold sun with 12 triangular rays and the lower triangle is green. == References == Namibia Category:1990 establishments Category:1990s establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in Namibia
title: Flag of Namibia
